array.name: array_beyond_verbal
array.item: OK %1$s. I\'m ready to analyze you.

array.name: array_beyond_verbal_error
array.item: Sorry %1$s, but I\'m afraid the emotion analysis failed.
Sorry %1$s, but I\'m afraid I was unable to analyze the emotions of the audio.
Apologies %1$s, but I failed to successfully analyze the emotional content.

array.name: array_no_comprende
array.item: Really sorry %1$s, but I\'m not sure what you meant by that.
Really sorry, but I\'m not sure what you meant by that %1$s.
I\'m sorry %1$s, but I didn\'t recognize that command.
I\'m sorry, but I didn\'t recognize that command %1$s.
